text: Ne shokhalabananga khumulimo kwiosi kwiosi, nohomba shosomanga mukurani muno nohomba shimukholanga eshikhole shiosi shiosi, halali efwe khubetsanga abaloli benyu olwa mukhalabananga. Sishifisanga khu Nyasaye wuwo eshindu shiosi shiosi, shili shinga obusiro bwolulolo, shili khushialo nohomba mwikulu tawe, nohomba eshititi okhushila esho nohomba eshikhongo, halali shili mushitabu shinoosinjia
